meanings.definition: A person or thing that inflates.
meanings.sent1: The inflaters at the party blew up colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: The tire inflaters at the gas station helped fill up the flat tire.
meanings.sent3: The inflaters in the bouncy castle were having a competition to see who could jump the highest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an inflaters, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The inflaters in the parade made the giant balloon characters come to life.

meanings.definition: A device used to inflate something.
meanings.sent1: The small inflaters in the toolbox were handy for blowing up beach balls.
meanings.sent2: The air mattress inflaters made setting up camp much easier.
meanings.sent3: The inflaters in the pool were shaped like cute animals, making swimming more fun.
meanings.sent4: His words were like inflaters, pumping up her confidence.
meanings.sent5: The inflaters for the inflatable pool were missing, so they had to blow it up by mouth.

meanings.definition: A substance used to inflate something.
meanings.sent1: The helium inflaters made the balloons float gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The bike tire inflaters were essential for keeping the tires at the right pressure.
meanings.sent3: The inflaters in the bubble solution created huge bubbles that floated in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as an inflaters, lifting the spirits of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The inflaters in the air mattress were leaking, causing it to slowly deflate during the night.
